contents.text:
A bow said to have caused an eclipse for
seven nights. Belonging to an old hero,
it appeared to guide lost souls through the
dark, as the brightest light in the night sky.
Midnight Sun

Graced by the spirit of an eagle said to have 
once guided a hero through the desert. When 
wielded, you feel all paths illuminated even in 
the darkest of nights.
Altair's Embrace

A shield to protect the one worthy of wielding
the Moon Slayer. It was made to protect an
ancient hero from all calamities, by an eagle
spirit who once eclipsed the sun for 7 days.

Forged from the ether, this blade was left
by an ancient hero exiled to the desert.
Bathed in an ethereal light, its edge has not 
forgotten the golden blood it once claimed.
Moon Slayer

As atonement for being denied the sword
that seals the darkness, this blad was
bestowed upon an outcast hero. His eagle
guides all those who are lost in the desert.
